message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $850000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $875000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $860000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $860000. However, I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $870000.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $865000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $865000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $880000.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. I am willing to pay $875000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $890000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $885000 for the product.
